title: Account Transfers
body: I find it incredible that I haven't been able to transfer my account from OCE to LAS for about a month now. How is it possible that RIOT still hasn't found a fix to the problem. I moved back to my country and I haven't been able to play here because of this. WHEN WILL TRANSFERS BECOME AVAILABLE AGAIN. Is Riot really working on a fix? Or am I just stupid enough to believe it and login everyday with the hope that it will be fixed. Perhaps this is the world telling me to stop playing this game.

replies.body:
You can follow the updates on the NA thread directly here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/hi2Yf2sI-account-transfer-service-down

And Gehirn will likely also mirror any important updates here on OCE: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/hi2Yf2sI-account-transfer-service-down
